result.arabic_text: وَٱلۡبَلَدُ ٱلطَّيِّبُ يَخۡرُجُ نَبَاتُهُۥ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِۦۖ وَٱلَّذِي خَبُثَ لَا يَخۡرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِدٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَشۡكُرُونَ
result.translation: 58.Meqe Baaxók tet Rabbih idinih ubukku ittaamay meqe teetik tawqe, uma Baaxoy xagadah tanik gibdaabinal uma cooxuy tuxxiq sinnik-sa tu-matawqa, tamannah tan Baxxaqqah Baxxaqqa hayna Astooti Yallih niqmat faatitah yan mar ah.
